one of the group of players on a cricket or baseball field who are the longest distance away from the batsman (= person trying to hit the ball): He was a star outfielder for the Brooklyn Dodgers. A middle-order batsman and good outfielder, he scored 10,996 runs in 16 seasons. See
outfield
